name: Himalayan Glow Rose Wax Candle with Remote

reviews.name: Himalayan Glow Rose Wax Candle with Remote
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for myself for the candle effect without flames. I was so thrilled with it when I received it I ordered two more for gifts when I need them. It was bigger than I thought so it makes a statement as well. It's simply lovely and elegant and will fit anywhere in your home.
reviews.title: A WONDERFUL gift item!!!

reviews.name: Himalayan Glow Rose Wax Candle with Remote
reviews.reviewText: LARGER THAN EXPECTED. BOUGHT AS A BIRTHDAY GIFT. I NOW WANT ONE FOR MYSELF.
reviews.title: GREAT

reviews.name: Himalayan Glow Rose Wax Candle with Remote
reviews.reviewText: All my friends & family want to know where I got it from they loved as much as I do! Very cute.
reviews.title: I had to buy this & glad I did.

reviews.name: Himalayan Glow Rose Wax Candle with Remote
reviews.reviewText: This candle is awesome! Has so many different colors! Looks beautiful!
reviews.title: Beautiful!!

reviews.name: Himalayan Glow Rose Wax Candle with Remote
reviews.reviewText: I ordered more than a dozen of the Himalayan Glow Rose Wax Candle with Remote to give for Birthdays/Christmas Gifts. So far, my friends and family members that received this item were very happy and conveyed to me that they loved it. I have to admit I found this item to be unique/different and knew that it would be appreciated by my friends/family.
reviews.title: Enchating Gift
